hero.headline: Welcome to my Homepage
hero.subline: This start page of my homepage gives an overall overview with respect to a number of topics. Some of these topics are covered more detailed on further pages.

technicalChallenges.headline: I Love Technical Challenges
technicalChallenges.subline: To me it is important to constantly improve. This includes topics like ...
technicalChallenges.entry3: trying to challenge myself again and again
technicalChallenges.entry4: implementing private projects like this webiste
technicalChallenges.entry7: living ideas until they form greatness

first.headline: Back to Life
first.content: To me, it is very important to have a decent work-life-balance. This also applies to screen time in general. I highly recommend going outside to have a walk once in a while.

second.headline: Music
second.content: In my opinion, music is something magical. It has the outstanding power to totally chance the mood, to support in hard times, or to make an evening a total blast.

third.headline: Projects
third.content: Projects listed on this website cover different fields and technologies to improve my overall understanding, toolset, mindset and possibly, my future career.
